fixed - `context` not working in `once()` method
fixed - Multiple event calls when removing/re-adding same record key
fixed - Error when using `orderByValue()`
fixed - `on('value')` not working properly with `filter()`
fixed - Bug in handling of cancel callbacks
fixed - Paginate cannot show one item per page
fixed - Errors not always being passed to the callbacks
changed - Better error message when passing in a query that uses orderByChild() to Paginate.
changed - Simplified internal handling of snapshots and improved performance.
feature - Improved `child_added` callback performance and timing; removed redundant callbacks
feature - `child_changed` events now work with filters
feature - reduced footprint, minified code has less includes and bytes
